name: Water Shooty: Bitmoji Edition
description:
The water fight is on! Unlock your Bitmoji through Snapchat login and water-shoot everyone with your own Bitmoji! Get new water guns and have fun! Customize your character and keep water-shooting!

Features:

- Addictive and simple levels
- Eye catching graphics
- Endless levels
- Daily quests and challenges

Powered by Bitmoji for Games
